attributes.action: amend the driving licence points tariff so that 12 points involves disqualification for life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our roads are overcrowded and driving requires concentration, patience and consideration for other road users. Careless or reckless driving creates danger for us all and the public need to be protected from those drivers who are repeat offenders. My petition seeks to make the holding of a driving licence a priviledge which will be removed by the courts permanently when offences accumulate 12 points.
